column5: Great for couples, solo adventurers and business travelers that need a safe & quiet place to sleep and store their stuff while exploring DFW. Cowboys, Rangers,Six Flags,Hurricane Harbor,Hawaiian Falls, Premium Outlet Mall, Walnut Creek Golf Course, Lifetime Fitness/24hr Fitness all within a short drive. Located off I20 & Hwy 360 South. 30 min to Ft. Worth/40 min to Dallas all highway miles.
column8: S. Arlington/Mansfield room perfect for explorers
